metadata.title: CVE-2023-4218 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Eclipse IDE versions < 2023-09 (4.29) some files with xml content areparsed vulnerable against all sorts of XXE attacks. The user just needs toopen any evil project or update an open project with a vulnerable file (forexample for review a foreign repository or patch).

criterions.comment: eclipse: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
